name: Into the Radius
summary:
Main Features
Extensive Gameplay:** Enjoy dozens of hours of slow-paced, suspenseful survival.
Challenging Environment:** Experience the unforgiving atmosphere of the Pechorsk Anomaly Zone.
Varied Locations:** Explore diverse natural, industrial, and urban settings with vast exploration potential.
Strategic Navigation:** Use a realistic map to plan your route, climb over obstacles, scout for shelters, uncover loot caches, and survive.
Authentic Weapon Handling:** Engage with classic and modern weapons...
